name: Nslider
author: Bhanu pratap singh

sections.description: This is a simple wordpress plugin which can add a slideshow with thumbnails in your wordpress site. there is many slider available in market but i am loogking for a plugin whit tabs type thumbnails so i just write that plugin.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload NSlider plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place [nslider-shortcode] sortcode in your any page or post.

short_description: This is a simple wordpress plugin which can add a slideshow with thumbnails in your wordpress site.
